name: Split Krieg
description:
Split Krieg is a split-screen local multiplayer asymmetrical tank 3D game. It was a practice of my Unity skills, de facto a prototype. Everything, except sounds, was created inside the engine.

Controls for the green player:

W, A, S, D - movement

Z, X - turret rotation

SPACE - firing

Controls for the red player:

Keyboard keys - movement

Mouse - turret rotation

LMB - firing

To win, one has to defeat an opponent two times.

The game is asymmetrical, so the red tank is moving and rotating faster. The green tank bears a more advanced barrel.
